member.summary: Throws a data exception, only used internally

member.summary: Append a whole object full of params to the dynamic EG: AddDynamicParams(new {A = 1, B = 2}) // will add property A and B to the dynamic

member.summary: All the names of the param in the bag, use Get to yank them out

member.summary: This class represents a SQL string, it can be used if you need to denote your parameter is a Char vs VarChar vs nVarChar vs nChar

member.summary: Add the parameter to the command... internal use only

member.summary: 替换变量[禁言xx]、[等级]、[全体禁言]、[取消全体禁言]、[群名]、[群公告]、[群号]、[群主]、[群人数]、[机器人名片]、 [机器人名片或昵称]、[QQ][昵称][名片][旧名片][入群时间][最后发言时间][积分][Q龄][名片或昵称] [随机符号表情] [随机表情]、[换行]、[机器人昵称]、[机器人QQ]、[时间]、[年]、[月]、[日]、[时]、[分]、[秒]

member.name: M:Coco.Framework.QQClient.ReplaceVAL(System.String)
member.summary: [随机符号表情]、[随机表情]、[换行]、[机器人昵称]、[机器人QQ]、[时间]、[年]、[月]、[日]、[时]、[分]、[秒]

member.name: M:Coco.Framework.QQClient.ReplaceVAL(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: [积分0+100] [积分0] 替换[QQ]、[个性签名]、[市]、[省]、[名片或昵称]、[昵称]、[个人说明]、[性别]、[年龄]、[生肖]、[星座]、[故乡]、[所在地]、[电话]、[手机] [主页]、[邮箱]、[地址]、[邮编]、[Q龄]、[姓名]、[英文名]、[职业]、[学历]、[学校]、[头像0]、[头像1]、[头像2]、[头像3] [随机符号表情] [随机表情]、[换行]、[机器人昵称]、[机器人QQ]、[时间]、[年]、[月]、[日]、[时]、[分]、[秒]
